channel.title: Sever fix?
channel.description:
Okay, when i start up the server after i put my ip in the server = "ip here" place i then save it then load up the server and do i need to compile or somet because i get a error saying "the system can not find the path specified" and idk if that means it worked or anything but yeah after i edit the client.java i load up the server and it says "server listening to port on 0.0.0.0:43954"
and i need my ip there how can i fix it?

item.title: Sever fix?
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

You didn’t compile right…
Set your path to javac.exe

Read full topic

item.title: Sever fix?
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

You do not need to multi-post about this.

Read full topic

item.title: Sever fix?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

the server should be listening in 0.0.0.0 because you want it to listen in YOUR computer and 0.0.0.0 is your local adress you can’t put yourr ip, you just can’t. where you have to put your ip for others to connect is on the client

Read full topic
